string-array.name: image_description_array
string-array.item: An image displaying the process of creation of a wand.
A fine example of the variety of wands available in the market.
Phoenix tail wand; probable the one used by harry potter.
A single wand. not sure about the origin.
To be honest, I am not even sure if it really is wand.
Weird, thats all I can say
